item.title: Haptikos unveils a hand exoskeleton for grabbing digital things in XR
item.description: Haptikos has unveiled a hand exoskeleton, meant to enable you to use your hands with precision in haptic applications in XR.

item.title: Pocket Worlds acquires AI-based UGC team Infinite Canvas
item.description: Pocket Worlds, maker of the popular social gaming app Highrise has acquired Infinite Canvas, an AI-driven user-generated content team.

item.title: We asked OpenAI’s o1 about the top AI trends in 2025 — here’s a look into our conversation
item.description: Here's what OpenAI's o1 had to say about AI trends this year. Just how many there are is a testament to AI’s general-purpose value.

item.title: DeepSeek R1’s bold bet on reinforcement learning: How it outpaced OpenAI at 3% of the cost
item.description: DeepSeek R1’s Monday release has sent shockwaves through the AI community, disrupting assumptions about what’s required to achieve cutting-edge AI per...

item.title: Why ‘prosocial AI’ must be the framework for designing, deploying and governing AI
item.description: Prosocial AI supports a hybrid future where human and machine intelligences co-evolve, guided by shared principles and grounded in truth.
